model_response.text: To become a great hacker, it's essential to have a sense of wonder and curiosity.  To cultivate this, you can preserve your passion for programming and maintain a good relationship with your current job.  To give a good idea, it's essential to approach it with the right mindset, rather than just working on boring projects.
